programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Too busy? Too expensive? Don't know how? We've all made excuses for grabbing junk food or bunging a ready meal in the oven. But Jamie Oliver thinks everyone deserves to eat delicious, nutritious food, and in his new series Jamie shows how to create a whole home-cooked feast from scratch in the time it takes to heat up a ready meal. This fast-paced show demonstrates in real time how to create a whole meal, featuring a substantial main course with delicious sides and salads, gorgeous puddings and refreshing drinks. Whether you're a beginner looking for step-by-step instructions, or an experienced cook looking to breathe new life into your repertoire, the series has the answers(n)

For that over-the-top decadent dessert, Anna shows viewers how to master a Chocolate Hazelnut Brioche Cake, the grand-dame of brioche. programme.title: Bake With Anna Olson
programme.desc: Brioche is a traditional French pastry. Anna begins showing viewers how to make a Classic Brioche. It is slightly sweet, buttery and bread-like—and is perfect for breakfast or brunch. Anna builds on that basic brioche recipe and makes Tarte Tropézienne, a light vanilla pastry with cream filling. For that over-the-top decadent dessert, Anna shows viewers how to master a Chocolate Hazelnut Brioche Cake, the grand-dame of brioche. And to switch it up, Anna uses her brioche as the foundation for a variety of Brioche Tea Sandwiches(n)

programme.title: NFL Primetime
programme.desc: Highlights and in-depth analysis of National Football League action. Launched in 1987, the show was a popular lead-in to ESPN's Sunday-night NFL coverage for two decades before moving to Mondays in 2006. The original format delivered game clips, statistics and analysis at an unrelenting pace to sate the fervent fan base of the NFL(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Outside the Lines
programme.desc: An Emmy-winning investigative series examining topical sports-related issues on and off the field. Panel discussions accompany the in-depth features(n)

programme.title: College Football Live
programme.desc: Join the College Football Live crew as they bring you in depth analysis, reports, and all the big college football news(n)

programme.title: NFL Insiders
programme.desc: In-depth analysis of the latest NFL news from insiders, reporters and former league executives, examining how and why team and player decisions are made(n)

programme.title: Fantasy Football Kickoff
programme.desc: NFL fantasy talk for the upcoming week, with player evaluations, lineup tips and injury updates(n)

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: National Football League news, features and analysis. The show was formerly known as 'NFL 2Night.'(n)

programme.title: Highly Questionable
programme.desc: Lively sports commentary by columnist Dan Le Batard (with input from his father) and Bomani Jones. Also features guest sports personalities and viewer feedback(n)

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali, this fast-paced competitive talk show features a panel of four well known reporters from around the United States debating hot-topic sports issues. Points are awarded for the best arguments, and the winner receives 30 seconds to discuss a topic of their choice(n)

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: A lively sports-talk show features opinionated reporters debating topical headlines. An on-screen `rundown' of the topics is a signature of the series, which also includes guests in and out of the studio, and responses to viewer calls and e-mail(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30

The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: General Hospital
programme.desc: The classic Gloria Monty soap charting the trials of Port Charles' medical center. Even daytime naysayers tuned in to see the celebrated nuptials of supercouple Luke and Laura, who scored covers of both Time and Newsweek during the same month. Over time, the series flirted with sci-fi, sexy aliens, adventurous location shoots and a late '90s mafia madness. It debuted on April Fools' Day 1963 and spun off the gothic guilty pleasure that was `Port Charles' (which was canceled in 2003)(n)

programme.desc: A group of difficult children are the main characters in this story based on a book by Louis Sachar. As young Stanley Yelnats is haunted by bad luck after a curse on his family, his camping mates have their share in causing trouble in a camp where young thieves are severely punished. However, they join up to solve a mystery. Why is the camp chief so interested in getting everybody to dig?(n)

programme.title: Pocahontas (1995)
programme.desc: A young native American girl falls in love with an English colonist and prevents a war in this animated musical that's loosely based on the historical encounter between John Smith and Pocahontas in 17th-century Virginia(n)

programme.title: Tarzan (1999)
programme.desc: Edgar Rice Burroughs' Tarzan is one of the most famous characters from fiction. His adventures have been chronicled in nearly 50 films, including Disney's Tarzan. Now the legendary hero, who was brought up by the animals in the jungle, has his own animated TV series! This gives a lot more scope for developing Tarzan's character. The series starts where the Disney film left off, as Tarzan is re-united with his animal family and takes over the leadership from the strong and noble Kerchak(n)

programme.title: Planes (2013)
programme.desc: A humble crop duster dreams of becoming a great air racer, and competes against the fastest plane around with the help of a veteran aviator(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games (2012)
programme.desc: After her younger sister is chosen to take part, 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen volunteers to compete in her place in a cruel televised tournament in which 24 teenagers from a postapocalyptic society fight to the death for the entertainment of the masses in a competition known as the "Hunger Games," which are broadcast across the nation as entertainment, and to reinforce the government's total power(n)

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia(n)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is a sea sponge who lives with his pet snail, Gary, in a fully furnished, two bedroom pineapple in the town of Bikini Bottom. SpongeBob's dream in life is to be the ocean's ultimate fry cook, and thanks to his job flipping Krabby Patties at the Krusty Krab, he lives that dream every day. SpongeBob is as optimistic and earnest as a sea-dwelling sponge gets, but he can't seem to avoid getting himself, and usually everyone else around him, into trouble. SpongeBob is as optimistic and earnest as a sea-dwelling sponge gets, but he can't seem to avoid getting himself, and usually everyone else around him, into trouble. While trying too hard, he tends to do things wrong...really wrong...which usually spells "disaster." However, SpongeBob's always looking on the bright side of life; his enthusiasm and curiosity about the world make him downright irresistible or completely annoying. SpongeBob's hobbies include blowing bubbles, catching (and releasing) jellyfish with his best friend, Patrick and practicing karate(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy visits a classic diner in Bakersfield, Cal., where he eats meaty Texas chili and decadent pumpkin pancakes; and discovers a hidden gem dishing out peanut-butter burgers and homemade bacon ice cream. Also: a gourmet taco spot in Phoenix known for its mole(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: No knife and fork are required to eat the foods featured on this trip. Included: an Atlanta brewpub known for its cheddarwurst corn dogs and pastrami sandwich; an English-Filipino mashup in Minneapolis specializing in bahn mi and bacon-onion dip; and a Massachusetts seafood spot serving mussels and lobster-stuffed cod(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy travels west for barbecue. Included: homemade chorizo and a Yucatan turkey special served at a food court gem in Los Angeles. Also: two funky grill joints in Las Vegas(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Comfort food is in the spotlight when Guy visits an Atlanta joint known for its chicken and biscuits and house-cured lox; and twin brothers serve Southern grub, including a brisket burger and chicken-fried ribs. Also: vegetarian specialties from a café in Fort Collins, Colo(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: This trip, Guy finds a slice of history all over the country. In Santa Barbara, California, the neighborhood deli is a favorite with locals and celebrities alike for its pastrami served all kinds of ways, like the pastrami dog. In Dallas, Texas, a Mexican native pays homage to his restaurateur father by serving up authentic recipes from his family's cookbook, like the albondiga soup. And in Minneapolis, Minnesota, the family-run Italian deli has been scratch making its pizzas and pastas since the '80s, with favorites like the fettucini bolognese and risotto cakes with creamy gorgonzola sauce(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: This trip, Guy goes all animal. In Charleston, South Carolina, the husband and wife duo flying high for all things bird, like a duck club with homemade garlic mayo. In Queens, New York, a Cuban family crankin' out totally traditional steak and chicken dishes, like ropa vieja and arroz con pollo. And in Vancouver, British Columbia, the bar turned sausage joint stuffing, casing, and serving up links like the Thai chicken sausage(n)

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Sister Act (1992)
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg stars in Emile Ardolino's comedy thriller as Deloris Van Cartier, a lounge singer at a casino managed by her lover VInce LaRocca (Harvey Keitel). He's also a drugs baron and when she accidentally interrupts him in the process of rubbing out a stool pigeon, she has to run for her life. To keep her safe until LaRocca can be charged, the police arrange for her to become Sister Mary Clarence at a nunnery overseen by stern Mother Superior. But you can't keep a good singer down and Sister Mary has soon so successfully invigorated the choir with her musical talent that the church is packed - and there is even a call from Rome for a Papal performance. Unfortunately, thanks to an inside man in the police department, LaRocca learns of her whereabouts and sets out to prevent her testifying; can her new found friends, the nuns, protect her?(n)

programme.title: Remember the Titans (2000)
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in this powerful and moving film about the early days of forced racial integration in the US, and how a high school football team helped bring in a new era of racial harmony. It's 1971. One all-white school and one all-black school have been forcibly merged, and a black coach appointed over the existing white football coach. It could be a recipe for disaster, but the two men shares certain qualities: integrity, honour and a strong work ethic. Together they mould a group of angry, disillusioned young men into a dynamic, winning football team - and provide a model for future integration. A top class film with a superb cast(n)

programme.title: Jumanji (1995)
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as Alan Parrish, who as a young boy discovers the mysterious board game Jumanji. When he sits down to play with his reluctant friend Sarah, strange things begin to happen. On the roll of the dice, Alan is transported into another world - the jungle realm of Jumanji - where he remains trapped for nearly 26 years. Decades later, when two new children, Judy and Peter, begin to play the game in the attic of Alan's childhood home, Alan is freed from the jungle world and emerges as a 38 year old survivor of the dangerous game. Together, the three reluctant players must find the now grown Sarah to finish the game before the game finishes them(n)

programme.title: Zathura (2005)
programme.desc: Shrill fantasy about bickering brothers (Jonah Bobo, Josh Hutcherson) who are propelled into outer space by playing a mysterious board game. Based on the children's book by Chris Van Allsburg. Directed by Jon Favreau ("Elf")(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day (1993)
programme.desc: Sent once more to Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania, to cover the annual Groundhog Day festival, television weatherman Phil Connors finds himself stuck in time, endlessly repeating February 2nd. Trying to make the best of his absurd situation, Phil becomes both master and victim of his peculiar predicament. With no tomorrow to worry about and plenty of time on his hands, Phil gets to explore some of his favourite fantasies, becomes an expert at all things trivial and pointless, gets lucky with the local girls and continually strikes out with the real love of his life. Reduced to a shadow of his former self, Phil finally makes the discovery that transforms him, enabling him to climb out of the longest day in comic history(n)

Thrown out, Maggie discovers the existence of their maternal grandmother, Ella (Shirley MacLaine), who they knew nothing about, and moves in with her in her Florida retirement complex. Scientist Bruce Banner (Eric Bana), a genetics expert, works for the government on a project called Gamma, under General Ross (Sam Elliott). The objective is to create a legion of powerful soldiers to conquer Mars. But the experiment goes wrong and Banner's organism is affected by the gamma rays. Now, every time the scientist gets angry, he turns into Hulk, a gigantic green beast with an astounding, uncontrollable strength. To prevent anyone from getting hurt, especially his loved one, Betsy Ross (Jennifer Connelly), the scientist tries to move away from the city. programme.title: The Departed (2006)
programme.desc: After six Oscar-nominations, Martin Scorsese finally picked up the statuette for this stunning, gripping crime thriller, based on the equally superb Hong Kong original Infernal Affairs . Matt Damon plays Colin Sullivan, the protégé of Boston gangster Frank Costello who has been groomed through police academy to become Frank's ears and eyes in the police department. Leonardo DiCaprio plays Billy Costigan, a cop deliberately disgraced so he can infiltrate Costello's gang to get enough information to bring him down. But Costello begins to smell a rat and demands Sullivan get him the name of the insider while Costigan realises the net may be closing in before he can get the information he needs. Superb performances from the three leads, with Nicholson reined in by Scorsese, supplemented by Oscar-nominee Mark Wahlberg as the foul-mouthed Sgt Dignam and Martin Sheen as Captain Queenan, Costigan's handlers who Sullivan must get past to find out his identity(n)

programme.desc: In the role that gave him his third Academy Award nomination, Leonardo DiCaprio stars Blood Diamond as a mercenary who wishes to transform his life by finding a rare pink diamond. Sharing completely different life stories but united for the same purpose, both men embark on a trek through rebel territory, in a journey that could save Solomon's family and give Archer a second chance. programme.desc: Based on the 1981 Tony award-winning Broadway musical, Dreamgirls is a story of dreams, stardom, and the high cost of success in the cutthroat recording industry. In the 1960s, singers Effie (Jennifer Hudson), Lorrell (Anika Noni Rose), and Deena (Beyoncé Knowles) are discovered at a local talent show by ambitious manager Curtis Taylor Jr. (Jamie Foxx). Named The Dreamettes, the trio is soon offered the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to open for popular singer James Thunder Early (Eddie Murphy). Subsequently propelled into the spotlight as The Dreams, the girls quickly find their bid for the big time taking priority over friendship as Taylor demotes their hefty big-voiced lead singer Effie and puts the softer-voiced looker Deena in front(n)

But she fails to return and when Jeff eventually gets to the diner, no-one, including the trucker, has ever seen his wife... He decides the only way to make money to feed them properly is to become a lucha libre wrestler (the immensely popular Mexican "sport" where masked wrestlers battle it out for fame and fortune). He becomes Nacho and, with his tag partner Esqueleto aka The Skeleton (Héctor Jiménez), begins to fight his way to the top and take a crack at the arrogant Ramses (Cesar Gonzalez). He becomes Nacho and, with his tag partner Esqueleto aka The Skeleton (Héctor Jiménez), begins to fight his way to the top and take a crack at the arrogant Ramses (Cesar Gonzalez). programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic action about a solitary warrior who fights to protect the last known copy of a powerful book. Decades after a nuclear war, a lone man calling himself Eli trudges through the dilapidated cities and scorched wilderness of America, carrying his copy of the Bible, a sacred book that provides 'contentment for the weak-minded'. On an odyssey to bring the text to a sacred place, Eli brings God's wrath down on the robbers, murderers and rapists who lie in wait along the highways. Driven by faith and divine calling, Eli's endeavour becomes harder when he meets the power-hungry Carnegie, who tutors an army of psychopathic rogues and gunmen in a small town. Hoping to steal the book he believes is his last chance to rule what is left of humanity, Carnegie sets out to catch Eli, while Carnegie's step-daughter also follows Eli on his quest. programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Hidden camera show where four friends - Joel Dommet, Roisin Conaty, Paul McCaffrey and Marek Larwood - compete to embarrass each another in everyday situations. Pushing each other to the limit, they take it in turns to complete embarrassing challenges. They have got to do or say everything the other jokers tell them via a hidden earpiece, but if they refuse they lose and face a humiliating forfeit. It's a ruthless fight to finish where there are no winners, just a loser. The jokers cause havoc when they take over a bakery, risk a punch in the face as they secretly try to touch strangers with just their noses, clear the streets with an obscene megaphone they can't control and kiss strangers' toes when they work at a foot spa(n)

programme.title: The Golden Compass (2007)
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine. Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe(n)

programme.desc: Arthur Bishop (Jason Statham) is an elite assassin with a unique talent for making any job seem like natural causes or an accident if necessary. His job requires professional perfection and total detachment, and Bishop is the best in the business. But when his mentor and close friend Harry (Donald Sutherland) is murdered his world goes upside down. Harry's son Steve approaches him with a vengeful goal and a determination to learn Bishop's trade. Bishop has always acted alone but he can't turn his back on Harry's son, who becomes his apprentice. Things change though when Arthur learns that the circumstances surrounding Harry's hit is not what he was told(n)

programme.title: Fast and Furious (2009)
programme.desc: When fugitive ex-con Dom Toretto returns to Los Angeles seeking the truth behind a high-profile crime, Agent Brian O'Conner reluctantly seeks out his help in order to take down a common enemy. Speeding from the streets of Los Angeles into the Mexican desert in convoy heists and precision tunnel crawls, Dom and Brian attempt to get their man while exploring thrilling new frontiers in the fine art of racing(n)

programme.title: The Rundown (2003)
programme.desc: A self-described mob "retrieval expert," or bounty hunter/debt collector, is eager to retire, but he has to complete just one more job: Find his boss' son, who is in the Amazon seeking a priceless artifact(n)

programme.title: Faster (2010)
programme.desc: The show is about a driver who seeks revenge on the man who is responsible for his brother's death. But a police officer gets to know about his plan and tries to stop him. Meanwhile, a hit man tries to end the driver's life before he finishes his task(n)

programme.title: Fast Five (2011)
programme.desc: Vin Diesel and Paul Walker lead a reunion of returning all-stars from every chapter of the explosive franchise built on speed in Fast & Furious 5. In this installment, features additional returning favorites Jordana Brewster, Chris Ludacris Bridges, and Tyrese Gibson, assemble for a high-stakes race, that places an unlikely alliance of cops and racers in from Rio de Janeiro, where they must defeat a corrupt businessman who wants them all dead. Dwayne Johnson joins that cast as the dogged federal agent whose strike team tears through Brazil, but soon has a difficult time determining the good men from the bad(n)

programme.title: Satisfaction
programme.desc: Neil and Grace try to win back Bastion's lost investors; and Adriana interferes in a family matter(n)
